name: phonebook-backend
description: This repository is dedicated to part 3 of the full stack open course by University of Helsinki

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../full-stack-open/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ../../.././fullStackOpen-part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Kartikay
